message: We pass through the door and find ourselves in a world of red.
I'm not quite sure how to describe it... The buildings have an old-fashioned Japanese feel to them, but are kinda modern at the same time.
And the sky is filled with glittering stars. You'd never see something like this in the Old Residential District.
Both the weather and the time of day are artificial in Platinum Jail. I've heard it's almost always night inside.
Supposedly the idea is to make it feel like a party every day, or make it more relaxing or something...
But the most prominent thing in the sky is the tower窶付he symbol of Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So that's Oval Tower..."
I've heard the rumors, but this is my first time seeing it.
There's something unsettling about it... like it's watching everything I do.

name: 紅雀
message: "Flame Willow, huh..."
Koujaku glances up at the sign, then looks around the area.

name: 紅雀
message: "I've got a bad feeling about this place. We oughta focus on getting our bearings first."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Good idea."

name: 紅雀
message: "Does that invitation mention anything about the area?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Lemme see."
I open the map attached to the invitation.

name: 蒼葉
message: "A map of Platinum Jail... What's this mark supposed to be?"

name: 蓮
message: "That must be the facility where we're staying."

name: 紅雀
message: "Why don't we start there?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sounds good. Ren, lead the way..."

name: 女Ａ
message: "My!"
Hearing a voice behind me, I turn to see a pair of women standing there.
Although their clothes are loud and gaudy, their expressions and mannerisms give them an air of elegance.
They're guests of Platinum Jail, after all. I assume they must be heiresses or something.

name: 女Ａ
message: "Those are some wonderful clothes you're wearing."
One of the women is staring intently at Koujaku. It doesn't look like he knows her.

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, thanks."

name: 女Ａ
message: "And you have such an adorable little bird friend!"

name: 紅雀
message: "His name's Beni."

name: ベニ
message: "Sup."

name: 女Ｂ
message: "Are you two new to this area?"

name: 紅雀
message: "We're new to the whole thing."

name: 女Ａ
message: "I thought so! You looked so confused, poor dear."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah, well we―"
Koujaku's smile suddenly freezes. His eyes are fixed on one of the women.
She has a tattoo of a large black spider on her neck.
A smaller―but three-dimensional―golden spider is sitting atop it. Her Allmate, obviously.

name: 女Ａ
message: "Is there something on my face?"
The woman gives Koujaku a curious look. He immediately forces the smile back onto his lips.

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh, sorry about that. I just couldn't take my eyes off you."

name: 女Ｂ
message: "Oh my!"

name: 女Ａ
message: "Like what you see?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, you're a very beautiful lady."

name: 女Ｂ
message: "Hehehe."

name: 女Ａ
message: "I like you."
The women giggle cheerfully.

name: 女Ａ
message: "We were just on our way to a party. Though I don't know if you could even call it that, really. It's just a place to relax and have fun."

name: 女Ａ
message: "You could join us, if you like."
Koujaku falls silent. He's gonna turn them down.
...At least, that's what I thought, but then the silence drags on.
Hey, come on. You're not seriously considering it, are you?
I know you're a ladykiller and all, but time and place, man...

name: 女Ｂ
message: "This is paradise, and we are the chosen few. No need to be so guarded. We might as well be family. Relax."

name: 紅雀
message: "...When you put it that way, how can I say no?"
I can't believe my ears.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Koujaku!"
Koujaku leans in close to my ear.

name: 紅雀
message: "I can use this opportunity to gather information. Work with me here."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's not what I..."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't worry. Looks like our Coils work here. See?"
Koujaku fiddles with his Coil. A few seconds later, mine beeps.

name: 女Ａ
message: "Is your friend okay?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah, but he won't be joining us. I'll have you all to myself."

name: 女Ｂ
message: "Hehe."

name: 紅雀
message: "Later, dude."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku!"
Koujaku walks off, one arm around each of the women.
I just stand there, stunned, and watch him go.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, like, even if... Like, that was a total dick move. Right, Ren?"
Ren pokes his head out of my bag. I hope he'll echo my frustration.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I mean, I always knew he was a manwhore, but I never knew he was that bad."

name: 蓮
message: "Koujaku will be Koujaku... but there is a time and a place for everything."

name: 蒼葉
message: "He oughta know that. I just hope he's really doing it for the information..."

name: 蓮
message: "I'd hate to think he was that shallow..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You and me both..."
I can feel the unease growing in my chest.
This is the last thing I want to be thinking about... but I can't shake my feeling of disappointment.
I never would've thought he'd run off with some girls in a situation like this.
What am I even supposed to do now?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, he's gone. Maybe I should do some investigating on my own."

name: 蓮
message: "Good idea."
